description: Source code for a TodoMVC application using Scala.js and the Binding library, implementing a to-do list with features like add, edit, delete, filter, and local storage persistence.

classes.name: Todo
classes.description: Class representing a to-do item with a title and completion status.

classes.name: TodoList
classes.description: Class representing a list of to-dos with display text and URL hash.

methods.name: main
methods.description: Entry point to render the TodoMVC application into the DOM container.

methods.name: header
methods.description: Creates the header section with input for new todos.

methods.name: todoListItem
methods.description: Renders a single to-do item with editing, toggling, and delete functionality.

methods.name: mainSection
methods.description: Renders the main section with toggle all checkbox and list of current todos.

methods.name: footer
methods.description: Renders the footer with filters, item count, and clear completed button.

methods.name: todoapp
methods.description: Assembles the main application view combining header, main section, and footer.
